page.title: 08The Churchill Complex
page.content:
In the {Theatre} there are 570 seats in the stalls and 190 seats in the circle. The seats cost 300p, 400p or 500p. You can buy tracksuits, have a meal in the {Restaurant}, buy dance shoes and go to dance classes at {Clown Alley}. On Mondays they have Yoga. On Wednesdays they have a Toddler Music and Movement class.
The {Public Library} has 77,305 adult borrowers and 12,148 child borrowers. They have a good local history section with over 6,000 photographs and a good audio-visual section with 1,000 compact discs.
At the top of the building is a {Conference Centre}. There are often exhibitions in the Library.
